-- Get all finance summary data in a single query
WITH daily AS (
  SELECT 
    COALESCE(SUM(ABS(amount)), 0) as total_spent,
    COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN is_grocery THEN ABS(amount) ELSE 0 END), 0) as grocery_spent,
    COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN is_restaurant THEN ABS(amount) ELSE 0 END), 0) as eating_out_spent,
    MAX(currency) as currency
  FROM finance.transactions
  WHERE date = (NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Dubai')::date
),
mtd AS (
  SELECT 
    COALESCE(SUM(spend_total), 0) as mtd_spend,
    COALESCE(SUM(income_total), 0) as mtd_income
  FROM life.daily_facts
  WHERE day >= date_trunc('month', life.dubai_today())
    AND day <= life.dubai_today()
)
SELECT 
  d.total_spent, d.grocery_spent, d.eating_out_spent, d.currency,
  m.mtd_spend, m.mtd_income
FROM daily d, mtd m;

-- Get recent transactions (last 30 days)
SELECT 
  id, date, merchant_name, amount, currency, category, subcategory,
  is_grocery, is_restaurant, notes, tags
FROM finance.transactions
WHERE date >= (NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Dubai')::date - INTERVAL '30 days'
ORDER BY date DESC, id DESC
LIMIT 100;

-- Get budgets for current month with spending
SELECT 
  b.id, b.month, b.category, b.budget_amount,
  COALESCE(SUM(ABS(t.amount)), 0) as spent,
  b.budget_amount - COALESCE(SUM(ABS(t.amount)), 0) as remaining
FROM finance.budgets b
LEFT JOIN finance.transactions t ON t.category = b.category AND DATE_TRUNC('month', t.date) = b.month
WHERE b.month = DATE_TRUNC('month', (NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Dubai')::date)
GROUP BY b.id, b.month, b.category, b.budget_amount
ORDER BY b.category;

-- Get category breakdown for current month
SELECT category, SUM(ABS(amount)) as total
FROM finance.transactions
WHERE TO_CHAR(date, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR((NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Dubai')::date, 'YYYY-MM')
  AND category IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY category
ORDER BY total DESC;
